reviews.text: The package arrived late and the box was damaged. Very poor delivery service.
I received the wrong product. Contacted support but got no proper response.
The website is easy to browse but the checkout process is very confusing. Please simplify it.
Product quality is good, but delivery tracking updates are very slow.
The product is fine, but customer service is rude and unhelpful.
Please add more payment options like UPI and wallets. Current options are limited.
The product description was misleading. Not happy with what I received.
Delivery was on time but packaging could be better. Box was half open.
Worst shopping experience. Late delivery, wrong item, and poor support all in one order.
Website design is nice, but please fix the search functionality. Results are often irrelevant.
Overall good shopping experience. Please add live chat support for faster help.
Delivery delay again. Tracking system does not work properly.
Checkout flow is very slow. Please improve payment processing speed.
Product is good but packaging looked careless. Please improve quality checks.
Received a defective item. Very disappointed. Need stricter quality checks.
Please improve product images on the website. They are not very clear.
Amazing service! Product exactly as described, fast delivery, and polite delivery staff.
Terrible experience. Wrong product sent and packaging was torn.
Website often crashes during checkout. Please fix technical bugs.
Overall good purchase. Please add more offers and discounts for regular customers.
